abstract: Photo of group of black women preparing for graduation from United States Military Academy at West Point, in which women are seen with clenched fists raised above their heads, has stirred controversy; gesture has drawn criticism that cadets are allying themselves with Black Lives Matter movement and sowing racial division in military.
lead_paragraph: The military academy has opened an investigation into whether the women violated Army rules that prohibit political activities while in uniform.

headline.main: Raised-Fist Photo by Black Women at West Point Spurs Inquiry
headline.print_headline: One Photo, 16 Clenched Fists and a Glimpse of a Riven West Point

snippet: The military academy has opened an investigation into whether the women violated Army rules that prohibit political activities while in uniform.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
